description: The Lap Log provides a stable rest for any type of tablet, eReader, or smartphone. It works with all iPads (iPad, iPad2, iPad3, iPad Mini, iPad Air) and all Kindles (Kindle Ink 6", Kindle Paperwhite, Kindle Fire HD 7", Kindle Fire HD 8.9"), Samsung Galaxy 7" and Galaxy 10.1", Nook, and more. If you have a heavy duty case on your device we can provide you with a wider insert (shelf) that will accommodate your case at no additional charge. The Lap Log is the only soft beanbag stand that will adjust to virtually any angle and stay there without having to constantly re-adjust it. It works great to hold your iPad or tablet in bed, on the couch, in the kitchen, at your desk or table, or while traveling. The Lap Log is made to the highest standards in the USA and is made from top quality sustainable materials that will last for years. The Lap Log is the highest rated soft tablet stand on Amazon for customer satisfaction. If you want a product that is simple, highly functional, and versatile, the Lap Log is it!
title: Lap Log Classic - Basic Black - iPad Stand / Touchscreen Tablet Holder - Good in Bed - Adjustable to Any Angle - Top Rated on Amazon - Made in USA
